players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was found dead. Let's investigate and discuss next steps."
Bob: "Alice, look into Diana next. Charlie's dead & I'm the mafioso."
You: "I'll investigate Diana as Bob suggested. Stay alert."
Bob: "Alice, watch Diana. I killed Charlie last night."
Diana: "I'll keep an eye on Diana. Bob, why would you kill Charlie?"
You: "I'll watch Diana closely. Bob, your alibi?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
